chrom.description: A string specifying the chromosome of region to be plotted

chromstart.description: An integer start position on chromosome to be plotted

chromend.description: An integer end position on chromosome to be plotted

assembly.description: A string specifying the default genome assembly or a\link[plotgardener]{assembly} object

fill.description: A character value(s) as a single value or vectorspecifying fill colors of transcripts

colorbyStrand.description: A logical value indicating whether tocolor plus and minus strands by the first two colors ina \code{fill} vector, where plus strand transcripts will becolored by the first \code{fill} color andminus strand transcripts will be colored by the second \code{fill}color

strandSplit.description: A logical value indicating whether plus andminus-stranded transcripts should be separated, with plus strandtranscripts plotted above the x-axis and minus strand transcriptsplotted below the x-axis

boxHeight.description: A numeric or unit object specifying height of transcripts

spaceWidth.description: A numeric value specifying the width of minimum spacingbetween transcripts, as a fraction of the plot's genomic range

spaceHeight.description: A numeric value specifying the height of spacingbetween transcripts on different rows, as a fraction of \code{boxHeight}

limitLabel.description: A logical value indicating whether to draw a "+"when not all elements can be plotted in the plotting space

transcriptHighlights.description: A two-column dataframe with a column named"transcript" or "gene" containing transcript names or their associated genenames as strings to highlight and a column named "color" containingcorresponding highlight colors

fontsize.description: A numeric specifying text fontsize in points

labels.description: A character value describing the format oftranscript text labels

stroke.description: A numeric value indicating the stroke width fortranscript body outlines

bg.description: A character value indicating background color

x.description: A numeric or unit object specifying transcript plot x-location

y.description: A numeric, unit object, or character containing a "b"combined with a numeric value specifying transcript plot y-location

width.description: A numeric or unit object specifying transcript plot width

height.description: A numeric or unit object specifying transcript plot height

just.description: A string specifying the justification of transcript plot relative toits (x, y) location

default.units.description: A string indicating the default units to use if\code{x}, \code{y}, \code{width}, or \code{height} are only given asnumerics

draw.description: A logical value indicating whether graphics output should beproduced

params.description: An optional \link[plotgardener]{pgParams} object containingrelevant function parameters
